Column.Name: BP
Meaning: Marker position in base pair (physical map)

Column.Name: cM
Meaning: Marker position based on selected approach/es (genetic map)

Column.Name: Mbp
Meaning: Marker position in base pair (physical map)

Column.Name: what
Meaning: Names of the approaches or breeds

Column.Name: size
Meaning: Size for each plot dot depending on hotspot or not (internal: 7-hotspot; 3-no hotspot)

Column.Name: coloring
Meaning: Color for each plot dot depending on hotspot or not

Column.Name: shape
Meaning: Shape for each plot dot depending on hotspot or not
